name: SMRHN.SM.PlaneSeven.Bi_Bj_ne_cubic

name: SMRHN.SM.seven_dim_plane_exists
declaration:
theorem SMRHN.SM.seven_dim_plane_exists  : ∃ B,
  LinearIndependent ℚ B ∧
    ∀ (f : Fin 7 → ℚ), ACCSystem.IsSolution (SMRHN.SM 3) (Finset.sum Finset.univ fun i => f i • B i)
